title: What song do you listen to when you feel like you need to cry? - Quora

response.answer_text: I usually listen to this song Hell - Sophia Kao  The writer writes the lyrics with fully emotional lyrics i’ve ever heard. With the acoustic sound and minor chords makes me feel like i’m going to cry tonight. The song talks about how we hate our partner is leaving, anytime sooner. And the writer wants to do anything to keep their relationship together. However, it breaks my heart to remember how i see my girlfriend talks to other guy, or hangout with them. I just can’t handle my feelings, i’m jealous. The other song is I Don’t Wanna Be Okay Without You - Charlie Burg  This song describe how you feel when you lose your partner. The lyric is too deep for me because i really can feel it. How can i be okay without her? I feel like she is stuck in my head. It’s hard to believe that your partner is leaving you behind and won’t come back.

response.answer_text: Have you ever heard Peter Gabriel‘s “Don’t Give Up“? If you want to cry it’s usually because you’re already sad. This song not only reinforces the feeling of crying but also tenderly supports you through whatever you’re going through. Don’t give up; don’t give up; don’t give up. It’s a song of failure but at the same time a song of hope. This is the kind of song I like to listen to when I’m down and want to cry but also need the encouragement. By the way, the only song I ever actually cried while listening to was “if Leaving Me is Easy“ by Phil Collins. It was right after a break up with a girlfriend that took me years to get over. It seems like I’m there again but I find it hard to cry. Oh well, that’s life I guess.
